content: I think I'll try using a timer on my phone to guide my intervals. I've heard of people using apps, but I'm not too tech-savvy, so I'll stick with what I know for now. I'll probably start with short intervals of 2-3 minutes of fast walking, followed by 2-3 minutes of regular walking. I'll see how that goes and adjust as needed. By the way, I got my foam roller from Amazon, and it arrived on March 2nd.
